## üöÄ Highlighted Projects

### 1. Learn with Sumit ‚Äì Scalable LMS Platform  
A Next.js + Node.js powered LMS serving 10,000+ students and generating 1 crore+ BDT revenue.  
Includes watch-time tracking, quiz/assignment flow, CV generator, real-time notifications, JWT auth, and DRM-protected streaming.  
**Stack:** Node.js, MongoDB, Cloudinary, Stripe, DRM, AWS S3, Next.js  

### 2. Distributed Video Streaming Platform  
Proof-of-concept for distributed, HLS-based video streaming.  
Built using Node.js, Express, FFmpeg, BullMQ, Redis, Docker, and MinIO.  
Handles upload, transcoding, and streaming through independent microservices.  
**Repo:** https://github.com/saadh393/distributed-hls-streaming-platform  

### 3. env-example-gen (NPM Package)
